page.title: 18DEFENCE
page.content: The 5th battalion of the light inf- antry,the 'D' Company, is based at the Drill Hall, Alton Road.There are 3 full-time officers and 105 part_time volunteer soldiers. A variety of guns consist of 74 rifles, 40 submachine guns, 8 GPMG's and 6 Anti-tank guns. Transport consists of 3 landrovers & 6 four-ton trucks. The rifle range is situated behind the T.A. base. There are 4 bunkers with l2 targets, approx. 600 yards long. Ross is frequently visited by low flying air- craft including - lightnings, harriers hawks, hunters, phantoms and tornadoes In the event of a nuclear war, no dir- ect attack threat exists but as we are only 25 miles from GCHQ a danger of radiation. Ross Police station is con- nected to the Uk WHO Network to regi- ster 'fall out'.
